title: Cant see friends list
body: When logging into the LoL client I cant see the friends list or connect to the chat server, whats going on? My friend is having the same issue.

replies.body:
Yeah, i can't login and i cant even login to the league client via mobile
this needs to be top priority right now.

http://www.msn.com/en-us/money/companies/east-coast-internet-service-attacks-coming-in-waves/ar-AAjeEkw?li=BBmkt5R&ocid=spartanntp

This may be an east coast specific issue, anyone having this issue NOT on the east coast?
I'm in the west coast and am also getting this issue.
I live in the mid-west myself, same problem.
same
It's an issue in OCE as well
Got a "unknown error" issue as well, Rito needs to get crackin'.
Feelsbadman, this is happening on my one night a week to play league with my friends
same this is the one night most of my friends are up late as i am and we usually play {{item:3070}}
exactly. i get precious little time to play and now this shit is happening ALL the damn time

I think it's related to the DDoS attack that just happened.
Link [here](http://money.cnn.com/2016/10/21/technology/ddos-attack-popular-sites/index.html)
Same problem (in Aus)

Along with not being able to connect to chat and play with friends, I also can't get into loot or crafting inventory. Although I should have earned a box, it didn't say I did. I'd hate for it to have just glitched me out of a box.
same thing for me, i got a s on lee and it didnt say i got the token ( it was my last token for mastery 6 {{item:3070}} ) when i went to check in my crafting inventory i couldn't get in
invites can still be sent through the traditional way of typing in the username in the invite box. and they will still receive the invite.
how does that?

I find it really sad that so many league players are so toxic about this issue. Yes, I understand it's a big invonvienence, but being rude is not going to fix it faster. Have faith in Riot, I'm sure they are doing the best they can.

As of this post there are 8 (eight) separate issues on the service status screen of the forums that Riot is aware of. Eight. I assume all of the new content and modes they've rolled out with worlds had some unexpected conflicts in the code. Thinking it might get worse before it gets better folks. Hold onto your butts.

No friends list. Cannot connect to chat. I lost 21 lp on a ranked that would not launch.... they did a /remake. Careful playing ranked right now. I'm going to stick to norms until the problem is resolved.
I am as well, I just lost a promo game to game crashing in champ select.  I would recommend to not play ranked till they get their crap fixed
Not for the NA it's not
Same make this top priority olz and stop everything on pbe and more on lice
Same problem. My friends couldn't invite me to a game, but I could invite them. I can't talk in chat.
I cant see my crafting inventory either< is this just me

Still happening to me here in Ontario. There's a popup saying an unknown error is occurring. Keeps popping up every time I try logging in or doing something in the client.
I can't load Hextech Crafting or the Store either. Keeps saying loading failed.
me and my friend are both having the problem
Same
Here in Ontario...
Finally the client has a notification that there is a problem with chat.
SAME. Halp pls
I'm having the same problem and i'm on the oce server

Midwest here, got the chat and friends list problems, and weird lag all over the place.  The lagging has gotten worse over the last couple weeks in general though for some reason.  Get an "unknown error" twice whenever I log in.
same unknown error still
Same
I'm in the Midwest and it wont let me connect to chat or play with friends, this should be fixed immediately
same issue here in california [this](https://s10.postimg.org/4d74mh8p5/league_of_legends_client.png) is what i see when i log in. and no matter what i cant connect to chat
Having this problem from the West coast, on both the Alpha Client and Legacy Client. Definitely a server issue.
Same issue here in Ontario Canada. It's not just a small area affected by this issue, it is the whole server.
can not chat
Hextech crafting is also down
Eastern US here. Having the same problem. I think it is a bug in riots client. I guess the best thing we can do is wait it out. Sorry I couldn't help with this one.
Trying to play a game with my girl and this damn problem is pissing me off fix the damn problem rito.
also me
Same problem noww!!!
Naahhh fck this im ganna go play dota they dont have shit like this ........ stupid fcken riot
I'm just having issues with the clubs; they just don't show up. Is it only on the Windows client or something?
Do you happen to main {{champion:32}} ?
